title: klien_br
author: klien_br
content: Senior member account registered in 2016.Clean account with 100% English posts.Including hotmail email login & btt loginNo staked address.Bid starts : $30Increment : $+5Buy it now : $45Note : Buyer pays the escrow fees.

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.body: Why would anyone want to buy an account? Isn't the part of farming your way up much more fun and more honest?!I don't recommend anyone to buy any account, you will only end up getting tagged, and start from zero with your own account, you will for sure enjoy the journey much more.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: There are many other business to do rather than selling an existing account of bitcointalk. And with just this singular attitude of yours, you have put your account at risk. Bitcointalk account were programed to shere ideas to grow mental skills and not to be compromised.. bear it in mind that what ever you do here, all eyes are on you.

comments.author: BabyBandit
